content: The record for most goals in a single DFB-Pokal season is held by Uwe Seeler, who scored 11 goals in the 1960-61 season. Seeler played for Hamburg at the time and helped his team win the DFB-Pokal that season. Seeler is considered to be one of the greatest German footballers of all time and is also the all-time top scorer for Hamburg with over 400 goals.
